uppanna sahathika nikuth kirimedi pradeshiya lekam karyalayanhi sewaya karana karyala karya sahayakawarun uppanna sahathika path ganimata ena janathawagen gasa kamata patan ganima nisa mahajanathawata dushkarathawayanta muhuna dimata siduwa thibe.uppanna, wiwaha ha marana sahathikayak winadi pahak athulathadi laba gatha haki bawata danwim puwaruwala sandahan kara thibunath ema sahathikayak ganimata illum path purawa niyamitha muddara alawa bhara dunnath edina hawas waruwatawath laba ganimata nohaki bawa pradeshiya lekam karyala wala eewa ganimata ena janathawa pawasayi.me karyalayanhi sewaya karana atham karyala karya sahayakawarun mahajanathawa rawata uppanna sahathika pitapatha payakin laba ganimata rupiyal dethun siyaya pamanak nowa rupiyal pansiyaya aadi ganan aya kara ganna awastha thibena bawa owuhu pawasathi.me mudal laba nodena ayage uppanna sahathika edina laba nodena bawada, “karyala lekhanagarayata poth awith naha” “potha labuna wita ewannam” yayida pawasa me sahathika path ewimata sathiyakata wada kalgani.
